info.description: Midi Mapping for the Pioneer DDJ-GRV6, 2025-12-28 18:52

control.description: B1 BROWSE - rotate - Scroll tracklist/tree view
B1 BROWSE - press - Move cursor between track list and tree view
B1 BROWSE +SHIFT - press - Move cursor between track list and tree view
B6 LOAD - Deck 1 - normal
B6 LOAD - Deck 2 - normal
B6 LOAD - Deck 3 - normal
B6 LOAD - Deck 4 - normal
D3 SHIFT - Deck 1 - normal
D3 SHIFT - Deck 2 - normal
D3 SHIFT - Deck 3 - normal
D3 SHIFT - Deck 4 - normal
D1 Play/Pause - Deck 1 - normal
D1 Play/Pause - Deck 2 - normal
D1 Play/Pause - Deck 3 - normal
D1 Play/Pause - Deck 4 - normal
D1 shift Play/Pause - Deck 1 - reverse playback
D1 shift Play/Pause - Deck 2 - reverse playback
D1 shift Play/Pause - Deck 3 - reverse playback
D1 shift Play/Pause - Deck 4 - reverse playback
D2 set/call cue, back cue - Deck 1 - normal
D2 set/call cue, back cue - Deck 2 - normal
D2 set/call cue, back cue - Deck 3 - normal
D2 set/call cue, back cue - Deck 4 - normal
D2 jump to track start - Deck 1 - normal
D2 jump to track start - Deck 2 - normal
D2 jump to track start - Deck 3 - normal
D2 jump to track start - Deck 4 - normal

D4 Jog Platter Vinyl mode ON - Deck 3 - scratch
D4 Jog Platter Vinyl mode ON - Deck 4 - scratch

D4 Jog Platter Vinyl mode OFF - Deck 4 - pitch bend

D4 Jog Platter - Deck 3 - search
D4 Jog Platter - Deck 4 - search

D4 Jog Platter touch - Deck 3 - enable on touch / disable on release
D4 Jog Platter touch - Deck 4 - enable on touch / disable on release

D7 LOOP IN/4 BEAT - Deck 2 - press, set loop in
D7 LOOP IN/4 BEAT - Deck 3 - press, set loop in
D7 LOOP IN/4 BEAT - Deck 4 - press, set loop in

D7 RELOOP/EXIT - Deck 3 - loop off, loop on
D7 RELOOP/EXIT - Deck 4 - loop off, loop on
